inclusion.criterion: previous study between 1997 - 2000, oral glucose tolerance test included
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: family predisposition to diabetes and cardiovascular diseases
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has COPD, OSA, obesity hypoventilation syndrome, dCHF. Daughter reports increased agitation and altered mental status x 2-3 days with O2 sats 60s-70s at home.
